abstract: The beleaguered bookseller could file for bankruptcy as early as next week after efforts to refinance its debt faltered.
snippet: The beleaguered bookseller could file for bankruptcy as early as next week after efforts to refinance its debt faltered.
lead_paragraph: Borders, the beleaguered bookseller, is preparing to file for bankruptcy as early next week after efforts to refinance its debt faltered, people briefed on the matter said Friday.

headline.main: Borders Prepares to File for Bankruptcy

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Julie Bosman
